about_the_game:
synopsis ============================

"Hey, did you write this?"

Ordinary Yi Seong High School high school boy A. He is just an incompetent student 1 who cannot study or exercise.

If there's a secret to him - he's a popular web novel writer who has more than 100,000 subscriptions and 1 million cumulative views-

People are enthusiastic about his realistic story, and the community is burned by the actions of the hero, "Shin Yu-ha."

She's athletic, has a good personality, and has good looks - Shin Yu-ha, the heroine of perfection. But who is she-

"What if you put my name in your web novel?! Are you crazy?"

Boy A, only to be caught by class president Shin Ha-yoon. At this rate, it's the whole year-!

The Perfect Love Comedy Let's Write a Web Novel! "Excellent Love Comedy," it's starting now!

game play ============================

The user is a first-year high school student at Yi Seong High School and spends his school life with Shin Ha-yoon, who wants to learn web novels, her friend Kim Yu-yi, and teacher Lee Seo-hyun, who taught him how to write web novels.

The game is played in a linear way, where the lines are progressed through screen clicks.

There is no separate favorability system, and you can select three last-minute options to view the ending of one of Shin Ha-yoon, Kim Yu-yi, and Lee Seo-hyun.

Game Composition ============================

Standing illustrations 6 types (3 characters)

11 CG illustrations

The ending 3 (Heroine star route)

Manipulation============================================

Select: left mouse click

Line Progress: left-click, scroll down the mouse wheel, enter key

Previous line: Scroll up the mouse wheel

Content skip: keyboard ctrl key, keyboard tab key

(Options > 'Skipping Everything' allows you to skip things you haven't read.)

Hide dialogue window: keyboard SPACE key

Image skip: keyboard ESC key

Resolution============================================

The game is optimized for QHD image quality and is also compatible with FHD image quality.

The game is fixed at a 16:9 ratio resolution for optimal play.

Please refer to this when adjusting the resolution.
